text: Kyah Pam Simon (born 25 June 1991) is an Australian soccer player. She plays for Tottenham Hotspur in the FA Women's Super League and for the Australia women's national soccer team (nicknamed the "Matildas"). In 2011, she became the first Indigenous Australian to score a goal at a FIFA Women's World Cup. ==Career statistics== ===International=== Australia national team Australia national team Australia national team Year Apps Goals 2007 1 0 2008 11 1 2009 0 0 2010 10 1 2011 11 5 2012 7 4 2013 2 0 2014 0 0 2015 18 5 2016 12 5 2017 6 2 2018 9 1 2019 0 0 2020 5 2 2021 13 1 2022 6 2 Total 111 29 :Scores and results list Australia's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Simon goal.
